history.text: Hello, the movie is John Wick. I don't think you should watch it.

?
What type of movie is it
An action movie but a sort of B-movie.
Does it have any good actors in it?
Not really. It has Keanu Reeves, Michael Nyquist, Alfie Allen, and Adrianne Palicki.
What is the plot?
A retired hitman seeks revenge after his car is stolen and his puppy has been killed.
Revenge over a dead dog?  Sounds like something a middle school student would do
I agree except that in the case of this movie, apparently a whole Russian Crime Syndicate is involved.
Oh crap the  Russians are into everything
They are even killing pets
Hahaha. In one of the scenes in the movie, there's a Russian syndicate that runs a car chop shop in NYC.
Why do all the movies happen in NYC?
There are tones of Russians here in Florida
And the weather is so much better
Who has the lead role in this movie
Good question. Also, why do so many cars get trashed in movies? This one features a chop shop and a scene in  which a black SUV gets smashed.
That'd be Keanu Reaves who seems to specialize in movies with car crashes.
Its always the Black Suvs that get smashed.
Right?
Where are all these chop shops I could use one next time im in a car wreck
Cheap car parts without having to go to the junk yard

Totally! 
In another scene in the movie features a "safe house" that turns out not to be so safe. Why are safe houses never actually safe in movies?
"Safe" houses in movies are always super nice too.   the goverment is not about to give anything any more than they have to.  They are going to put you in the hood or in a trailer
With 30 year old furniture that smells
Right? It's not even a govt safe house in this movie - it's all criminal underworld stuff.
Does it feature so hot chicks?
Only in memory, I think. The main character's wife has recently died so sort of a missing woman trope.
Oh, and by the way, she's the one who gave him the puppy.
So he's actualy mad that the memory of his hot wife died with the cute puppy so he is out to kill the russians
I couldn't have summed it up better myself.
So, basically it's a bunch of action movie tropes all rolled into one featuring Keanu Reaves. I can't recommend it!
its a great netflix and chill movie if you dont actualy plan on watching the movie.
Could be but it's pretty violent and grim.
Loud enough to drown out any noises so your room mates or kids dont know whats going on

uid2response.feedback: Its a less than awesome action film problably great for a teen boy
